chart.title: Carbon dioxide concentrations in the atmosphere
chart.subtitle: Atmospheric carbon dioxide (CO₂) concentration is measured in parts per million (ppm). Long-term trends in CO₂ concentrations can be measured at high-resolution using preserved air samples from ice cores.
chart.citation: NOAA Global Monitoring Laboratory - Trends in Atmospheric Carbon Dioxide (2025); EPA based on various sources (2022)
